title: torch.nn.init.orthogonal fails with LAPACK error
body_html:
Reproducer:

>>> import torch.nn as nn
>>> import torch.nn.init as init
>>> layer = nn.Conv2d(3, 64, kernel_size=(3, 3))
>>> init.orthogonal(layer.weight.data)

Intel MKL ERROR: Parameter 6 was incorrect on entry to SGESVD.

Intel MKL ERROR: Parameter 3 was incorrect on entry to SGESVD.
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/nn/init.py", line 216, in orthogonal
    u, s, v = torch.svd(flattened, some=True)
RuntimeError: Lapack Error in gesvd : Illegal Argument 3 at /home/marat/tools/pytorch/pytorch/torch/lib/TH/generic/THTensorLapack.c:461
